Sentece: Recoveries of TMO and DMO ranged from 96 to 104% using a 0.1 ml of plasma.
Title: Pharmacokinetic studies of trimethadione and its metabolite in rats with chemical-induced liver injury.
Name: Paramethadione

Sentece: After an oral administration of TMO at a dose of 100 mg/kg, mean plasma levels of TMO and DMO in 6 rats reached a peak of 98 microgram/ml at 0.6 h and 163 microgram/ml at 8 h and declined with a half-life of 2.2 h and 39.4 h, respectively.
Title: Pharmacokinetic studies of trimethadione and its metabolite in rats with chemical-induced liver injury.

Title: Pharmacokinetic studies of trimethadione and its metabolite in rats with chemical-induced liver injury.
Name: Paramethadione

Sentece: After the intravenous administration of TMO at a dose of 100 microgram/kg, half-lives of TMO and DMO were 2.5 h and 39.1 h, respectively.
